_COMMENTS: default: cluster launch controlled by master, in-app warp&blend via MPCDI
desktopWarpBlend: like default, but with desktop warping, i.e. MPCDI provies only frusta
desktopWarpBlend_woMaster: like desktopWarpBlend, but without master machine being part of the cluster; instead rt5 is the cluster master
debug: cluster launch, but no snyc; just for testing startup scripts and quick local tests
originalCalib: like default, but unaltered MPCDI content from incorrect export
oldWorkingDeploy: stuff on install dir /d/devel/OpenSpace/OpenSpace_ownDeploy that once worked
WARNING: installDir may NOT end with a / (slash)!!!11 Otherwise, rsync will dump the files one folder too high up in the hierarchy!
